title: 08Convert NSDate that is composed from hour and minute only to a full NSDate
There are many cases when one has created an NSDate from only an hour and minute format, i.e: 08:12 that returns from a server as a String and you initiate an NSDate instance by these
values only.

title: The downside for this situation is that your NSDate is almost completely “naked” and what you need to do is to create: day, month, year, second and time zone in order to this object to “play along” with other NSDate types.
